description:
A serial killer indiscriminately killing demons appears in Tomoharu`s city. Fed up with the Takatsuki group`s guards, Kanade turns to Tomoharu. At the same time, Shuri arrives with another visitor for Tomoharu. Entering Rakurowa High School as a foreign student is the ten year old child prodigy Ania Fortuna, youngest daughter of the Fortuna family of luck eaters. Tomoharu is left in charge of two young demon girls, but...
Source: crunchyroll
